Package ca.uqac.lif.cep.peg.ml

Functions and processors to compute trends over sets of pre-recorded streams.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusteringFunction  
    DistanceFunction
    Wrapper to use Apache Commons' DistanceMeasure objects as BeepBeep Functions.
    DistanceToClosest  
    DoublePointCast
    Attempts to create a DoublePoint out of an object.
    JoinVectors  
    KMeans  
    KMeansFunction
    Computes the K-means clustering algorithm on a set of points.
    ListToDoublePoint
    Converts a list of numbers into a DoublePoint object.
    MeanAndVariance
    Processor that outputs a two-dimensional DoublePoint out of a stream of numbers, containing the running average and running variance of the stream.
    ProcessorMiningFunction<T,U>
    Mining function that uses BeepBeep processors to extract patterns from traces.
    ProcessorVectorFunction<T>
    Vector function derived from a processor outputting numerical values.
    RunningMoments
    Processor that outputs a n-dimensional DoublePoint out of a stream of numbers, containing the first n running statistical moments of the stream.
    RunningVariance
    Processor computing the running variance of a stream of numbers.
    SetMiningFunction<T,U>
    Extracts a pattern from a set of sequences.
    StatMoment
    Computes the running statistical moment of order n on a stream of numbers.
    VectorFunction<T>
    Function that turns a sequence of events into another sequence containing a single vector of numbers.

Package ca.uqac.lif.cep.peg.ml Description

Functions and processors to compute trends over sets of pre-recorded streams.
